name: Mask'Raiders
description:
Scare those adults straight into hiding in their houses. Deduce their phobias by watching the visiting trick-or-treaters and change into the proper costume to frighten them when they open the door.

Made in 24 hours for the NOVA IGD Fall Game Jam (2016).

Team:
Eric Briggs - @squall1101
Micha Faw - @ghostmaple
John Pascale - @S1C_N3S
